Understand, recognize and develop your people

Understand, recognize and develop your people Teambit helps teams create a high performing culture with regular feedback.

Sign up with Google or Sign up with Slack
or use your email address

Traditional people processes lead to disengagement
and turnover.

They are hardcore,
formal and disconnected

They don't encourage
regular feedback

They don't make it
safe to speak up

It doesn't have to be like that. Teambit is a modern
solution that teammates love.

It's lightweight,
fun and interconnected

It encourages regular
feedback with contextual requests

It creates a safe
environment for dialog

Here is how it works
